thread.title: Mary from Honolulu
thread.title_full: Words Anywhere reviewed by Mary from Honolulu

author: Mary from Honolulu
title: Mary from Honolulu
text:
I only used the vinyl letters/numbers for a mailbox so did not have to deal with long sentences, but they were very easy to apply and look great. Shipment arrived quickly and was very inexpensive for such beautiful lettering. I cannot vouch for longevity because I just got it.
The website was a little confusing but I eventually got my order right.
